attributes.action: CEREATE AN part off goverment that deals with english matters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THERE MUST BE IN PLACE AN ENGLISH GOVERMENT TO DEAL WITH MATTERS THAT ONLY APPLY TO ENGLISH AFFAIRS

rejection.details: Please change the text to lower case.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
